entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add support for skipping visibility checks with AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly #85020
  • Random.NextSingle returns 1.0 #85016
  • [Analyzer suggestion]: Avoid recursive iterators #85015
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce an intrinsic for more efficient lambda generation #85014
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml`, and `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly` tests breaking for AOT on rolling builds #85013
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests`+AOT failing on rolling builds #85012
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT tests failing because `Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly` is not getting skipped for AOT #85010
    8.0.0
  • TypeLoadException when attempting to create an instance of a struct of particular type #84999
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers #84995
    8.0.0
  • Issues understanding a StackOverflowException from System.Diagnostics.Process.AsyncStreamReader #84993
  • BigInteger has a buggy assert #84991
  • Bad CodeAnalysis warning and inaccessible DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute to fix it #84990
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient/HttpMessageInvoker metrics #84978
    8.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs #84974
  • `DeflateStream/GZipStream/BrotliStream .BaseStream` when instance is disposed #84973
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform. #85019
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Utf8Formatter #84989
  • [Perf] Alpine/x64: 7 Regressions on 4/6/2023 3:49:07 PM #84988
  • [API Proposal]: Compiled framework-dependent `.exe` should automatically download and install appropriate runtime #84969
  • Coredistools failure to disassemble vextracti64x4 #84967
    8.0.0
  • [JitStress] JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/bge_un* failures #84966
  • Re-open #43410: Subsequent calls to ConfigureAppConfiguration cannot see previously added Providers #84958
  • Uri.Query should not start with a question mark #84955

Closed

  • Intermittent failure in JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/tlstest_il_r/tlstest.dll #84818
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in System.IO.Compression.Deflater.DeallocateInputBufferHandle() during finalization #84994
  • [6.0][windows][mono] HttpRequestException : Unknown error 0xffffffff 127.0.0.1:RandomPort #84175
  • [Fuzzlyn] Arm64 failure for negation, cast, bitwise-and #84693
    8.0.0
  • .NET Debugging services don't issue thread create callbacks for single file apps #77574
    8.0.0
  • Missed optimization with `Math.Abs`; Branches generated on x86 #84986
  • [MONO][TEST] Bring up iOS/arm64 and iOSSimulator arm64 Runtime tests in CI #81233
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Eventpipe Runtime Test Failures on iOS Simulator #74891
    8.0.0
  • [cecil] Enable source-build pre-built detection #84985
  • nativeaot/SmokeTests/DwarfDump failing on linux-x64 Debug #84979
  • Linux musl x64 build break apparently due to some libc version mismatch (high priority as it is blocking clean CI) #84949
  • `RuntimeInformation.OSDescription` is really `KernelDescription` #83287
  • [NativeAOT] Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() throws nullref exception #84944
  • Reflection regression - Type.GetType does not skip leading `.` #84644
  • [JitStress pipeline] Runtime_72363 is failing #84961
  • Tracking issue for CI build failure "agent ran longer than the maximum time of 180 minutes" #82084
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused helix queue definitions #85018
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Improve mono_print_ins (). #85011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable previously disabled test #85009
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reduce the number of hwintrinsic tests by removing no longer interesting scenarios #85008
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Increase the opcode value for opcodes where the jiterpreter is able to unroll sets and moves #85007
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #85006
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add binary parsing support to integer types #84998
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add documentation for merge on red, build analysis, and v1/v2 tests #84982
    documentation, needs-author-action, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [browser] JSObject thread affinity assertions #84981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JsonConsoleFormatter: keep escaped line breaks for Exceptions #83726 #84972
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Improve DateTime{Offset} formatting further in a variety of cases #84963
    needs-area-label
  • Update ECMA-335 for function pointer changes #84962
    area-Meta
  • [LoongArch64] revert the modification about the LA64's PageSize by #83632. #84960
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump .NET 7 Package Version #84956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Disable TLS field access for Arm #84954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary array allocation in DateTimeParse #84964
    area-System.Globalization
  • Don't contain operands for intrinsics when generating a jmp table fallback #84933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add config binder generator to ASP.NET Core transport pack #84436
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Revert Deflater/Inflater changes around SafeHandle initialization #85001
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0] Disable 2 failing tests for 6.0 #84726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix setting managed breakpoints in singlefile apps with direct-mapped R2R sections #84965
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512 variants of SSE-SSE4.2 instructions #84909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Split PortableThreadPool.WorkerThread start and loop body #84490
    area-System.Threading
  • Start running Loader and Interop tests for NativeAOT #84404
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix OperatingSystemTest.TestIsOSPlatform_MacCatalyst #84842
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Bump expected Dwarf warning count #84980
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix R2R test build #84952
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Split the MergedTestWrapper for the HWIntrinsic tests so we can actually filter per platform #84959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the compiling errors for aligned and definiations. #84971
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] fix the CMakeLists which destroyed by RISCV #82381. #84970
    area-VM-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix Environment.GetCommandLineArg for AOT compiled libraries #84953
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Type.GetType for global type names with leading '.' #84957
    area-System.Reflection
  • [RISC-V] Disable corelib crossgen2 #84781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Adjust managed type system for new function pointer handling #84819
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Accelerate Vector512 `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToInt32`. #84932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix instuctions for nativeaot build #84919
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Obsolete some protected, unused members of Regex{Runner} #84812
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84738
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix unrollings on AVX1-only machines #84946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser] Make JSExport worker thread friendlier #83680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-approved, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.7
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Making sure we have at least one region per gen during plan phase #83076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #84920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Delete `GT_STORE_OBJ` #84951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Various fixes for consecutive registers found with jitstressregs #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: consider using the LLVM nuw and nsw operations for add #2256

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to apr 15 #2255

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the first-run experience for workloads - detect common version mismatch scenarios and tell the user the actions to perform to resolve them #31872
  • I get error NU1202 when I try to build the SDK on my local machine #31856
  • Unable to load shared library 'hostfxr' or one of its dependencies on Alpine inside Docker #31848

Closed

  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • Self-contained app with Trim unused code selected trims used code #31832
  • Certificate expired - Microsoft package registry #31862
  • NETSDK1085 invoking `dotnet publish --no-restore --no-build` on multi-project build using dirs.proj #18206
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor #31776
  • GenAPI generates invalid '$' token in method name #31657
  • `dotnet tool update --install <tool>` #31824

PullRequests

Created

  • Copied some out of sync loc files into main #31871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Fix regression in blazor+aot #31870
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Signing: enable NuGet signature verification by default on Linux #31868
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disambiguate GenAPI calls to base constructors #31860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet/sdk-container-builds#414 by using three-digit version #31852
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Fix incorrect MicrosoftSourceLinkBitbucketGitVersion property name #31863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Some additional prebuilt baseline cleanup #31853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't emit `new` for explicit interface implementations #31854
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Ensure GenAPI synthesize ctors when visibility filter would otherwise omit them #31843
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • CS1584+CS1658/CS0081 when using constructed generic types in XML comments #401
    Backlog
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113

PullRequests

  • inline-arrays.md: correct typos #7128

Updated

  • Add interceptors working group notes #7116

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Record member does not match positional parameter" diagnostic message is unclear #67869
  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync reduces default expression removing relevant type arguments #67867
  • Test.cmd takes 35 minutes locally #67864
  • IDE0051 and IDE0052 are slow #67855

Closed

  • `SyntaxFacts.IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` only returns true for all global attribute targets #67485
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33618.212 #67866
  • Completion from unimported namespaces doesn't honour implicit usings #58473
    Backlog
  • LSP pull diagnostics performance issues in squiggles + error list #65935
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Flatten code actions when client doesn't have VS capability #67868
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix lsp classification mappings #67865
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better recover from missing closing `}` or `]` in switch statements #67862
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Adjust `IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` helper #67833
    Next
  • Backport #67430 further #67851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only sync events about C# and VB to unit testing service #67863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Adds InternalsVisibleTo for External Access layer for razor benchmark project #67853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Only used cached remote-host-provider for preview workspace if it shares the same set of host-services. #67840
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add A/B option to test if a pushing data immediately to secondary storage is desirable. #67843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not allocate Location[]s for source methods #67823
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #67870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clarify documentation of `TrackedOutputSteps` #67835
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, single_query #47769
  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #47767
  • How do I get the Vite dev server to work with the Azure AD authentication? #47763
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, endpoint #47757

Closed

  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, single_query #47726
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47756
  • Perf improvement: mvc #47742
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47750

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ASP.NET's JSON feature switch #47770
    area-mvc
  • Add support for binding from form body to RDG #47768
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update servicing milestones for June #47765
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add exception to problem details context #47760
    area-runtime
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [Blazor] Update selenium #47761
    area-blazor
  • Log if request reaches the end of request pipeline #47681
    area-runtime
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime, feature-rdg

Updated

  • Reset ConnectProtocol during reset #47660
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • Log if a server certificate lacks the subjectAlternativeName extensions #47678
    area-runtime
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Blazor form model expression formatting #47754
    area-blazor
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in OutputCaching, ResponseCaching #47753
    area-signalr
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Update ReadMe.SharedCode.md to mention runtime-sync.yml #47722
    area-runtime
  • Add AOT flag to worker template #47721
    area-mvc
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime
  • [blazor] Boot handled by dotnet.js #47752
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    8.0.0
  • DiagnosticsClient.GetPublishedProcesses returns dead processes PIDs on Linux and macOS #3699
    Future
  • dotnet-counters formatting broken in 8.0 #3665
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0
  • Failed to profile .NET iOS app (`dotnet trace`: Unable to read beyond the end of the stream) #3828

PullRequests

Created

  • Reimplement !dso and !fq in C# #3837

Merged

  • Fix #3699 #3836
  • Fix incorrect rendering of counters #3816
    dotnet-counters, auto-merge, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Update docker images to latest tags #3535

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Optimize the package by removing the unnecessary runtimes when publishing #14646
  • Unable to deploy app with `Debug | x86 config`; must hardcode `RuntimeIdentifier` #14644
  • Grid auto height behaving differently between Windows and Android #14643
    Backlog
  • [Android] Navigating event not fired from WebView for data:video links with download attribute presented #14636
    Backlog
  • ByteArray as Source in <Image> is not loading when run in Android Version 12 #14635
  • Allow `Shell.Current.DisplayPromptAsync` to be cancelled with a `CancellationTokenSource` #14631
  • PointerGestureRecognizer CommandParameter using ICommand as declaring Type instead of object #14629
  • TableCell Margin | Spacing #14628
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't Vertically Align anything with Entry in a Grid #14645
  • MAUI 7.0: ListView with Recycling strategy causes issues with images, on both iOS and Android #13008
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Bug] Border sizes to container instead of wrapping content #2692
    Backlog
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14428
  • Getting error on code that is not generated in MAUI #14430
  • Open the accessibility of all theme related classes and structures. #14455
  • TypeConverter not respected when evaluating Binding #7683
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • [Housekeeping] Removed fixed page background color in the Gallery #14639
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlc] enable for $(Configuration) names like ReleaseProd #14638
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [graphics] fix CA1307 and CA1309 for performance #14627
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #14625
    area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1 #14291
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON type representations and conversions to store types #30727
  • Avoiding duplicate code in Linq Select method and only project the properties I need #30726
  • Simplified output path (UseArtifactsOutput) isn't friendly with ef migrations #30725
  • Optimized translation for indexing of JSON primitive collections #30724
  • `Remove` together with `SaveChangesAsync` didn't delete entities. #30723
  • I get different results when registering the concurrency update: one throws an exception, the other doesn't #30720
  • HasIndex method of OwnedNavigationBuilder is missing overload that accepts index name #30718
  • Autogenerated ids are not populated to EntityEntry #30717
  • EFCore allow binary serialisation of built model to speed up subsequent restarts #30716
  • Update Disconnected Entities #30714
  • Nested collections of primitive types #30713
  • Handle entity Contains via queryable constant/parameter parameter roots #30712
  • Change Translate methods on QueryableMethodTranslatingEV to accept untranslated source #30711

Closed

  • explicitelly loaded owned type / reusable table splitting #30719
  • Usage of CancellationToken that is passthrough long running hosted service results in memory leak #30715
  • How would `jsonb` evolve to EF 8.0? #30710

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trimming warnings in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #30728

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WindowsServer 2022] https://aka.ms/dotnetcore-6-0-windowshosting fails to register AspNetCoreModuleV2 under IIS #16140

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable PVP flow for templating repo #16149
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16146

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #16126

Updated
